name: signalk-schema
description: SignalK specification schema as an npm module with tests

scripts.docs:build: npm run build && gitbook build gitbook-docs master
scripts.docs:all: npm run docs:build && npm run docs:pdf && npm run docs:mobi && npm run docs:epub
scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:all && git add master && git stash && git checkout gh-pages && git checkout stash -- master && git add master && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs' && git push git@github.com:signalk/specification gh-pages

author: SignalK group
